detail_description: We're running in a JVM JIT bug (leading to a crash) when running Lucene 9.9.0. The crash happens with (at least) all JDK releases between 19 and 21.0.1. There is no crash in the currently unreleased JDK 21.0.2 and JDK 22. The JDK issue tracking this is https://bugs.openjdk.org/browse/JDK-8321370 . Since running into this with Elasticsearch we've excluded the offending two methods from compilation, see elastic/elasticsearch#103112 and elastic/elasticsearch#103004 The text was updated successfully, but these errors were encountered:

change_description: : Push and pop OutputAccumulator as IntersectTermsEnumFrames are pushed and popped
